# Copilot Instructions

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
  - Node.js Express SPA web server with HTML and JavaScript. The server should serve a web page where users can input their name, email, and password. On button click, the data is sent to the server using fetch and recorded in a list on the server. Another button allows the list to be viewed.

- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Progress
- Project requirements clarified. Proceeding to scaffold the project structure.
